Articles.Content:
The Updater is grayed out , and will not work (known problem)

I'm Running a 2018 MacBook Pro which handles the game fine. 

To update I normally have to do a full reinstall them move my craft. 

Does anyone know a Fix? or a workaround, (other than full reinstall)
The updater has been broken since 1.0. There is no other solution than to either fully reinstall or to rebuy it on a platform like Steam that has it's own update mechanism.

On 2/18/2019 at 1:36 PM, Harry Rhodan said:

The updater has been broken since 1.0. There is no other solution than to either fully reinstall or to rebuy it on a platform like Steam that has it's own update mechanism.

Thanks, just bought it on steam
